001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.zeromq;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.FlowableProcessor;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.PublishProcessor;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.RxBlockchainBinaryService;
007import org.consensusj.rx.zeromq.RxZmqContext;
008import org.slf4j.Logger;
009import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
010import org.zeromq.ZMsg;
011
012import java.io.Closeable;
013import java.net.URI;
014import java.util.Collections;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Optional;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory;
019import java.util.stream.Collectors;
020
021/**
022 * Bitcoin Zmq <b>binary</b> service that connects to a single port.
023 * Use {@code RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService} if Bitcoin Core is configured to run ZMQ on multiple ports.
024 * See: <a href="https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19572">PR 19752</a> for sequence topic information
025 */
026public class RxBitcoinSinglePortZmqService implements RxBlockchainBinaryService, Closeable {
027    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RxBitcoinSinglePortZmqService.class);
028
029    private final URI tcpAddress;
030    private final Set<BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic> topicSet;
031
032    private final RxZmqContext zmqContext;
033
034    private final FlowableProcessor<byte[]> rawTxProcessor = PublishProcessor.create();
035    private final FlowableProcessor<byte[]> rawBlockProcessor = PublishProcessor.create();
036    private final FlowableProcessor<byte[]> hashTxProcessor = PublishProcessor.create();
037    private final FlowableProcessor<byte[]> hashBlockProcessor = PublishProcessor.create();
038
039    private long hashBlockSeq = -1;
040    private long hashTxSeq = -1;
041    private long rawBlockSeq = -1;
042    private long rawTxSeq = -1;
043
044
045    public RxBitcoinSinglePortZmqService(URI tcpAddress, ThreadFactory threadFactory, BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic... topics) {
046        this(tcpAddress, threadFactory, Set.of(topics));
047    }
048
049    private RxBitcoinSinglePortZmqService(URI tcpAddress, ThreadFactory threadFactory, Set<BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic> topics) {
050        this.tcpAddress = tcpAddress;
051        topicSet = Collections.unmodifiableSet(topics);
052        List<String> stringTopics = topics.stream().map(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic::toString).collect(Collectors.toList());
053        zmqContext = new RxZmqContext(tcpAddress, stringTopics, threadFactory);
054        for (BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic topic : topics) {
055            // Subscribe to each topic
056            switch (topic) {
057                case hashblock:
058                    zmqContext.topicPublisher(topic.toString()).subscribe(this::onNextHashBlock, hashBlockProcessor::onError, hashBlockProcessor::onComplete);
059                    break;
060                case hashtx:
061                    zmqContext.topicPublisher(topic.toString()).subscribe(this::onNextHashTx, hashTxProcessor::onError, hashTxProcessor::onComplete);
062                    break;
063                case rawblock:
064                    zmqContext.topicPublisher(topic.toString()).subscribe(this::onNextRawBlock, rawBlockProcessor::onError, rawBlockProcessor::onComplete);
065                    break;
066                case rawtx:
067                    zmqContext.topicPublisher(topic.toString()).subscribe(this::onNextRawTx, rawTxProcessor::onError, rawTxProcessor::onComplete);
068                    break;
069                case sequence:
070                    zmqContext.topicPublisher(topic.toString()).subscribe(this::onNextSequence, this::onError, this::onComplete);
071                    break;
072                default:
073                    throw new RuntimeException("Unknown topic");
074            }
075        }
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public Flowable<byte[]> transactionBinaryPublisher() {
080        return rawTxProcessor;
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public Flowable<byte[]> transactionHashBinaryPublisher() {
085        return hashTxProcessor;
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public Flowable<byte[]> blockBinaryPublisher() {
090        return rawBlockProcessor;
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public Flowable<byte[]> blockHashBinaryPublisher() {
095        return hashBlockProcessor;
096    }
097
098
099    @Override
100    public void close() {
101        zmqContext.close();
102    }
103    
104    private Optional<ParsedMessage> parseMessage(ZMsg message) {
105        log.debug("New message received.");
106
107        Optional<ParsedMessage> parsedMessage;
108        if (message.size() >= 2) {
109            BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic topic = BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic.valueOf(new String(message.remove().getData()));
110            log.debug("Received {} message.", topic);
111            byte[] dataBytes = message.remove().getData();
112            if (topic != BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic.sequence)
113            {
114                long seqNumber = fromByteArray(message.remove().getData());
115                log.trace("sequence number {}:{}", topic, seqNumber);
116                parsedMessage = Optional.of(new ParsedMessage(topic, dataBytes, seqNumber));
117            } else {
118                // TODO: Additional sequence parsing?
119                parsedMessage = Optional.of(new ParsedMessage(topic, dataBytes, -1));
120            }
121        } else {
122            log.warn("Ignoring message with less than 3 frames");
123            parsedMessage = Optional.empty();
124        }
125        return parsedMessage;
126    }
127
128    private void onError(Throwable error) {
129        log.error("Seq Error: ", error);
130    }
131
132    private void onComplete() {
133        log.error("Seq Complete");
134    }
135
136    private static class ParsedMessage {
137        final BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic topic;
138        final byte[] dataBytes;
139        final long seqNumber;
140
141        private ParsedMessage(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic topic, byte[] dataBytes, long seqNumber) {
142            this.topic = topic;
143            this.dataBytes = dataBytes;
144            this.seqNumber = seqNumber;
145        }
146    }
147
148    private void onNextHashBlock(ZMsg message) {
149        Optional<ParsedMessage> opt = parseMessage(message);
150        if (opt.isPresent()) {
151            ParsedMessage parsed = opt.get();
152            processHashBlock(parsed.dataBytes, parsed.seqNumber);
153        }
154    }
155
156    private void onNextHashTx(ZMsg message) {
157        Optional<ParsedMessage> opt = parseMessage(message);
158        if (opt.isPresent()) {
159            ParsedMessage parsed = opt.get();
160            processHashTx(parsed.dataBytes, parsed.seqNumber);
161        }
162    }
163
164    private void onNextRawBlock(ZMsg message) {
165        Optional<ParsedMessage> opt = parseMessage(message);
166        if (opt.isPresent()) {
167            ParsedMessage parsed = opt.get();
168            processRawBlock(parsed.dataBytes, parsed.seqNumber);
169        }
170    }
171
172    private void onNextRawTx(ZMsg message) {
173        Optional<ParsedMessage> opt = parseMessage(message);
174        if (opt.isPresent()) {
175            ParsedMessage parsed = opt.get();
176            processRawTx(parsed.dataBytes, parsed.seqNumber);
177        }
178    }
179
180    private void onNextSequence(ZMsg message) {
181        Optional<ParsedMessage> opt = parseMessage(message);
182        if (opt.isPresent()) {
183            processSequence(message);
184        }
185    }
186
187    private void processHashTx(byte[] dataBytes, long seqNumber) {
188        checkSequenceNumber(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic.hashtx, hashTxSeq, seqNumber);
189        hashTxSeq = seqNumber;
190        hashTxProcessor.onNext(dataBytes);
191    }
192
193    private void processHashBlock(byte[] dataBytes, long seqNumber) {
194        checkSequenceNumber(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic.hashblock, hashBlockSeq, seqNumber);
195        hashBlockSeq = seqNumber;
196        hashBlockProcessor.onNext(dataBytes);
197    }
198
199    private void processRawTx(byte[] dataBytes, long seqNumber) {
200        checkSequenceNumber(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic.rawtx, rawTxSeq, seqNumber);
201        rawTxSeq = seqNumber;
202        rawTxProcessor.onNext(dataBytes);
203    }
204
205    private void processRawBlock(byte[] dataBytes, long seqNumber) {
206        checkSequenceNumber(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic.rawblock, rawBlockSeq, seqNumber);
207        rawBlockSeq = seqNumber;
208        rawBlockProcessor.onNext(dataBytes);
209    }
210
211    // See: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19572
212    private static void processSequence(ZMsg message) {
213        //checkSequenceNumber(Topic.sequence, sequenceSeq, seqNumber);
214        log.warn("Got sequence: {}", message);
215    }
216
217    private static void checkSequenceNumber(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic topic, long previous, long current) {
218        if ((previous != -1) && (current != previous + 1)) {
219            log.warn("Topic {} missing {} sequence numbers: previous = {}, current = {}", topic, current - (previous + 1), previous, current);
220        }
221    }
222
223    private static long fromByteArray(byte[] bytes) {
224        long result = 0;
225
226        for (int i = 0; i < bytes.length; i++) {
227            long ubyte = bytes[i] & 0xff;
228            result += ubyte << (8 * i);
229        }
230        return result;
231    }
232
233}
